fields.name: Warning:
fields.value:
Do not touch. May be hot.
Attack: Varies
Defense: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Stand guard at a player's house, burning their visitors if they are attacked.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> If the player you are guarding is attacked, burn their visitors. This deals a basic attack to them, and if they survive it deals 1 stage higher attack each following night until they die.
> When you die, burn all your visitors.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: > Kill all who would oppose the Town.
